name: country_code
description: M49 numeric country or territory code

name: name
description: M49 country or territory name

name: year
description: Year (row-specific)

name: transition_condition_met
description: TRUE = transition condition is met for this year, otherwise FALSE

name: surf_prob
description: SURF probability for this year; NA in years at the edges of the analysis period where probabilities cannot be calcuated (depends on the smoothing bandwidth)

name: surf_year
description: TRUE = this year is a SURF year, otherwise FALSE

name: rate_prob_surf_year
description: TRUE = transition, rate, and probability conditions are met for the this year, otherwise FALSE

name: min_inter_surf_length_surf_year_pre_continuation
description: TRUE = this year was made a SURF under the minimum inter-SURF length condition, before the application of the continuation condition, otherwise FALSE

name: min_surf_length_surf_removed_pre_continuation
description: TRUE = this year was a SURF but it was removed under the minimum SURF length condition, before the application of the continuation condition, otherwise FALSE

name: continuation_surf_year
description: TRUE = this year was made a SURF under the continuation condition, otherwise FALSE

name: exceedance_condition_surf_removed
description: TRUE = this year was a SURF but it was removed under the exceedance condition

name: min_inter_surf_length_surf_year
description: TRUE = this year was made a SURF under the minimum inter-SURF length condition, after the application of the continuation condition, otherwise FALSE

name: min_surf_length_surf_removed
description: TRUE = this year was a SURF but it was removed under the minimum SURF length condition, after the application of the continuation condition, otherwise FALSE

name: surf_year_start
description: TRUE = this year is the first year of a SURF period

name: surf_year_start_pre_continuation
description: TRUE = this year was the first year of a SURF before the application of the continuation condition

name: surf_year_group
description: If this year is a SURF year this is the unique ID for this SURF period where periods are numbered sequentially in chronological order and the first SURF has ID "1"; otherwise NA

name: surf_year_len
description: If this year is a SURF year this is the length (in years) of the SURF period; otherwise NA

name: surf_in_proj
description: If this is a SURF year, TRUE = this year is in the projection period, FALSE = it is not; otherwise NA

name: Schoumaker_stall_type
description: If this year is a Schoumaker stall, the type of stall [takes values in c("Moderate evidence", "No stall", "Strong+ evidence", "Strong+ evidence", "Strong+ evidence", "Weak or conflicting evidence", "Pretransitional")]; otherwise NA

name: Schoumaker_stall_strong
description: TRUE = Schoumaker stall with "strong+" evidence, otherwise FALSE

name: Schoumaker_stall_moderate
description: TRUE = Schoumaker stall with "moderate" evidence, otherwise FALSE

name: Schoumaker_stall_weak
description: TRUE = Schoumaker stall with "weak or conflicting" evidence, otherwise FALSE

name: Schoumaker_stall_pretransitional
description: TRUE = Pretransitional Schoumaker stall, otherwise FALSE

name: Schoumaker_stall_none
description: TRUE = this is a year Schoumaker analyzed and found no evidence for a stall of any kind, otherwise FALSE; not the inverse of 'Schoumaker_stall_any' because some years were not analyzed

name: Schoumaker_stall_any
description: TRUE = a year with a Schoumaker stall of any kind, otherwise FALSE

name: Schoumaker_included
description: TRUE = this country or territory included in Schoumaker's analysis

name: indicator
description: The indicator used to find tfrSURFs, currently always "TFR"

name: TFR.2.5pc
description: Posterior 2.5th percentile of TFR

name: TFR.10pc
description: Posterior 10th percentile of TFR

name: TFR_median
description: Posterior median of TFR

name: TFR.90pc
description: Posterior 90th percentile of TFR

name: TFR.97.5pc
description: Posterior 97.5th percentile of TFR

name: reg_name
description: Name of the subregion this country or territory belongs to (e.g., Eastern Asia, Middle Africa, etc.)

name: area_name
description: Name of the region this country or territory belongs to (e.g., Europe, Oceania, etc.)

name: sub_saharan_africa
description: TRUE = this country or territory is in sub-Saharan Africa, otherwise FALSE

name: pop_lt_90k_2024
description: TRUE = this country or territory had a population of less than 90 000 in mid-2024

name: smoothing_method
description: The smoothing method used [one of c("local_linear", "annual_difference")]

name: transition_condition_type
description: The transition condition used [one of c("Phase II & >= 2.1 persistently", "Phase II & never < 2.1", "Phase II only")]

name: bandwidth
description: The size of the smoothing bandwidth in years

name: rate_threshold
description: The threshold used for the rate condition

name: rate_prob_threshold
description: The threshold used for the probability condition

name: continuation_condition
description: The continuation condition used [one of c("Regain TFR, median, 2yr", "Regain TFR, probabilistic", "NONE")]

name: continuation_condition_prob_threshold
description: The threshold used for the continuation condition

name: exceedance_condition
description: The exceedance condition used [one of cc("Max TFR > 2.1, median", "Max TFR > 2.1, probabilistic", "NONE")]

name: exceedance_condition_prob_threshold
description: The threshold used for the exceedance condition

name: min_inter_surf_length
description: The minimum inter-SURF length used

name: min_surf_length
description: The minimum SURF length used

name: bayesTFR_present_year
description: The "present year" for this run of bayesTFR

name: bayesTFR_wpp_year
description: The "WPP year" for this run of bayesTFR

name: year_lim_start
description: The lower limit of the analysis period

name: year_lim_end
description: The upper limit of the analysis period
